title: Banks, FBI Assessing Hack of Real Estate Finance Tech Vendor
description: The hack of a technology vendor for real estate financiers left major American banks and mortgage lenders working Sunday to assess whether they were affected by the data breach.

title: Apple iOS 27 to Be No-Frills ‘Snow Leopard’ Update, Other Than New AI
description: Apple’s next major iPhone software update — iOS 27 — will have two major elements: quality improvements and artificial intelligence features. Also: The report on Tim Cook’s imminent departure as CEO is premature, and OpenAI continues poaching Apple engineers. Lastly, the iPhone Air designer who introduced the device has left the company.

title: Musk Says Tesla Nears AI5 Chip Tape Out, Starting Work on AI6
description: Tesla is nearing the final step of the design process for its AI5 chip and starting work on a new AI6 chip to be deployed in its cars and data centers, Tesla CEO Elon Musk said Sunday in an X post.
